article_title: We want to know how you are spending OU/Texas weekend! Send us your pictures!
article_text:
DALLAS – Sooner fans are getting ready for the annual Red River Rivalry against the Texas Longhorns!

The Sooners will enter the game with a 4-0 record, while the Longhorns are just 1-4.

Are you making the trip down to Dallas for the game? Or will you be watching it from the comfort of your home?

Either way, we want to see your pictures!

Send them to us at 4@kfor.com, or post them on our Facebook or Twitter page.
